message: I'm being fair, but I want most of the money. Take it or leave it!
My turn to be fair. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats your share!
I'm still willing to negotiate, but this is getting closer to what I'm comfortable with.  Inflation is biting, so let's reach a deal before we both lose out.
The rate is getting worse for you, Alice. Let's close this deal with a win-win.
